DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Program Trunk Neuromuscular Pattern Postural Control Pregnant With Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: For study , proposal 6-week intervention program carry lumbar stabilization exercise clinical orientation , 20 low back pregnant patient recruit convenience voluntary community . Before intervention , participantes evaluate : electromoyography three exercise , balance , clinical outcome pain , disability psychological factor . All baseline test evaluation perform blinded evaluator study intervention . Afterwards , participant randomize two group blind evaluator ( people enrol study ) : G1 : exercise lumbar stabilization ; G2 : conventional therapy . The intervention follow six week , 50 minute duration session therapy include measurement blood pressure , heart rate Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) session , perception exercise intensity monitor Borg Scale . Within proposal , exercise session twice week , last 40 minute , follow 10 minute theoretical orientation . The intervention follow CONSORT recommendation randomize controlled trial . The intervention start : G1 ( n=10 ) , perform therapy specific exercise lumbar stabilization include Swiss ball therapeutic resource ; G2 ( n=10 , control group ) perform conventional therapy include stretch low limbs trunk . The participant blind study due characteristic exercise often reflect improvement symptom . In case eventual loss , intention-to-treat method use analysis . After intervention , group invite come back laboratory proceed evaluation baseline ( trunk activation three exercise , balance , clinical outcome ) For analysis two-way ANOVA repeat measure perform compare effect intervention ( two group ) time ( baseline vs. end 6-weeks measurement ) effect interaction ( Groups x Times ) .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : Have 1929 week pregnancy ; Have perform prenatal clinical monitoring ; Have chronic low back pain ( > 3 month ) without irradiation knee . Not medication physical therapy treatment low back pain last three month ; To able perform physical activity consistent pregnancy ; To present normal condition responsiveness , cognition speaking ; To voluntary . The exclusion criterion : Signs symptom pathology include coexist pathology , recent history ( within 3 month ) surgery locomotor system ; Respiratory , neurological cardiovascular disease . Several musculoskeletal disorder . Limitations physical exercise . Allergic reaction adhesive tape ,
